Charles B. ELDREDGE, Appellant-Respondent,
v.
Susan M. RUCH, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 12A02-1710-DR-2352 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed May 1, 2018

KIRSCH, J., Concurs.
